Key Match Events: Houston Astros struggled in extra-innings games, continuing a trend of poor performance in such situations.
The Astros failed to capitalize on scoring opportunities, especially in late innings, leading to their loss.
The Athletics won in the 12th inning with a series of bunts, taking advantage of the Astros' defensive lapses.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros have a poor record in extra-innings games since 2020, often performing better in regular innings.
The team's season is struggling, with a 6-18 record in extra-innings since last year.
